item.title: Sickchill Deprecation Notice
item.description: Due to a lack of upstream development we have decided to deprecate our Sickchill image.
item.content: Due to a lack of upstream development we have decided to deprecate our Sickchill image.

item.title: New Container: Sickchill
item.description:
We have released a new container for Sickchill!

Sickchill is an Automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Sickchill!

Sickchill is an Automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.
